attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the ambulance staff in west yorshire are behind in the rest of england in saftey please can u help by sigming we want personal radios stab vest ooooh yes we need them, all we have is an old fashion mobile phone you will know them has bricks WE NEED MORE MONEY GIVEN TO US ALSO SOMEBODY TO MAKE SURE IT GOES TO THE FRONT LINE STAFF AND NOT ON SOME OFF THE USELESS STUFF?WE WOULD ALL LIKE TO GO HOME TO OUR FAMILYS

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action, not a statement/name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
